name: Bandwidth Masked Number API
description: Bandwidth Voice & Messaging API Sample App routing SIP calls

BANDWIDTH_USER_ID.description: Your Bandwidth API User Id, like u-kljgl934s

BANDWIDTH_API_TOKEN.description: Your Bandwidth API Token, like: t-kgkja23skd

BANDWIDTH_API_SECRET.description: Your Bandwidth API Secret, like: ja35ijsadfoi

BANDWIDTH_DOMAIN_NAME.description: Desired domain name for this demo app. This is used for your SIP creds. Must be unique!!!
